data.title: Dallas, Texas Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Dallas, Texas with information about Dallas, Texas official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Dallas, Texas is officially in the Central Time Zone

The Current Time in

Dallas, Texas is:

Thursday

8/15/2024

2:54 AM

CDT

Dallas, Texas

is in the

Central Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Central Standard Time - is abbreviated as CST

Central Daylight Time - is abbreviated as CDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Dallas, Texas is GMT/UTC - 6h during Standard Time

Dallas, Texas is GMT/UTC - 5h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Dallas, Texas starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
